OrgName: Acotel Interactive, Inc. d/b/a Flycell, Inc.
activities: The organization operates websites on behalf of its customers. In so doing, the organization receives information (including personally identifiable information) from those customers, when individuals provide it to the organization as part of registering for the organizations' websites, apps or "opting in" for promotions, programs or offerings from those customers.  Privacy policy created at http://www.acotelinteractive.com/#aiprivacy
recoursemech: Acotel Interactive Inc. has also agreed to participate in the dispute resolution program provided by the European Data Protection Authorities and to comply with the advice of the Swiss Data Protection Commissioner. The company will cooperate with the European DPAs and the Swiss Data Protection Commissioner in the resolution of any dispute concerning EEA/Swiss human resources and information technology provisioning data
